          <title>
            <string language="en">Acid-base reactions: ammonia gas and hydrogen chloride gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Säure-Unterseite Reaktionen: Ammoniakgas 
und Wasserstoffchlorverbindung Gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réactions d'Acide-base : gaz d'ammoniaque 
et gaz de chlorure d'hydrogène</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reações da Ácido-base: gás da amônia e
gás do cloreto de hidrogênio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">reazioni della Acido-base: gas 
dell'ammoniaca e gas dell'acido cloridrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντιδράσεις όξινος-βάσεων: αμμωνία αέριο 
και υδροχλώριο αέριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reacciones de la A'cido-base: gas del 
amoníaco y gas del cloruro de hidrógeno</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Third of three illustrations demonstrating acid-base reactions and their corresponding products. This shows ammonia gas reacting with hydrogen chloride gas.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Third von drei Abbildungen, die Säure-Unterseite
Reaktionen und ihre entsprechenden Produkte zeigen. Dieses zeigt
das Ammoniakgas, das mit Wasserstoffchlorverbindung Gas reagiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tiers de trois illustrations démontrant des 
réactions d'acide-base et leurs produits correspondants. Ceci 
montre le gaz d'ammoniaque réagissant avec le gaz de chlorure 
d'hydrogène.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Third de três ilustrações que demonstram 
reações da ácido-base e seus produtos correspondentes. Isto 
mostra o gás da amônia que reage com o gás do cloreto de 
hidrogênio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un terzo di tre illustrazioni che dimostrano le 
reazioni della acido-base ed i loro prodotti corrispondenti. 
Ciò mostra il gas dell'ammoniaca che reagisce con il gas 
dell'acido cloridrico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρίτο τριών απεικονίσεων που καταδεικνύουν τις 
αντιδράσεις όξινος-βάσεων και τα αντίστοιχα προϊόντα τους. 
Αυτό εμφανίζει αμμωνία που αντιδρά αέριο με το 
υδροχλώριο αέριο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tercero de tres ilustraciones que demuestran 
reacciones de la a'cido-base y sus productos correspondientes. 
Esto muestra el gas del amoníaco que reacciona con el gas del 
cloruro de hidrógeno.</string>
          </description>
